name: AiBō 「あいぼう」
description:
Duality (n.)

the state of combining two different things;

This game refers to our main character, Ai-Bo. Ai is a little orange-colored boy while Bo's a dog with blue.

They have a friendly relationship called 'Partner(あいぼう)', Promising each other for being friend forever.

BUT LIFE CAN'T LAST THAT LONG, RIGHT?

Bo first died of old age. Sadly, Ai's too pure to understand what death is.

He starts to find where his partner is-- here and there, but nowhere to be found.

Our little boy searches into a deep- deep hole, fantasizing he's in a candy world while it's chaos in truth!

Bo(in spirit form) should go find and help!

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Instructions

AiBō is a 2-player-game with a concept of two contrasting things which are compatible with each other. 

While Ai(human) can see only illusion world and interact, 
Bo(the spirit) can see, walk through the truth and possess.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Made in 48 hours for GGJ2022, 
won 1st place in Global game jam Bangkok(DPU) site 🏆
